pages.text: The page filler texture (seen at the end of any entry with an uneven amount of pages) is a free to use texture that was not made by me. I was not able to track down the original author due to the many copies and re-uploads circling around. Should you know who the original author is, please let me know.
Most ship names were generated using the ship and yacht name generators on Fantasy Name Generators.
Most sounds used were obtained from pixabay.com and mixkit.co. Both sites offer free to use, royalty free sound effects without required attribution.
